snippet: Brek Shea scored his first goal in an international match, sending the United States into a quarterfinal game against El Salvador on Sunday.
abstract: United States national soccer team defeats Costa Rica, 1-0,  in its final Gold Cup group-stage game.
lead_paragraph: Brek Shea scored his first goal in an international match, sending the United States into a quarterfinal game against El Salvador on Sunday.

headline.main: United States Tops Costa Rica in Gold Cup
